Text: Being trying to get a decent ,easy to use ripper for ages!Im practically a noob!! at best; in-experienced, lol. So i'll let peeps know what i thought; ( in case anyone, i.e. another noob, actually cares :-)

Hi-- opinion, as promised: set up was easy,serial no. worked fine,1st on list, activated 1st time,ripped a Family Guy compilation DVD;(The Freakin' Sweet Collection!) 1st time and to my admittedly amateur eye, looked excellent !!! As i've said, im defo no expert, but can say, if you are just starting out with all this, this upload from 'Bigwimpie' is shit hot, easy to set up and easy to use, with top marks for results!! But: what do i know ;-)
